content:
Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 4, "index": 23}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 62, "index": 36}, {"type": "carved_pumpkin", "quantity": 21, "index": 38}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 44, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft an iron_pickaxe, I need to craft 3 iron_ingots and 2 sticks. The most efficient way to do this is to use the iron_block to craft 9 iron_ingots, and then use the bamboo to craft 4 sticks. Therefore, I will start by moving the iron_block from slot 14 to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 4, "index": 23}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 62, "index": 36}, {"type": "carved_pumpkin", "quantity": 21, "index": 38}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 44, "index": 42}]
thought: After crafting the iron_ingots, I need to move them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9

Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 4, "index": 23}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 62, "index": 36}, {"type": "carved_pumpkin", "quantity": 21, "index": 38}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 44, "index": 42}]
thought: I need to craft two sticks before I can craft the iron_pickaxe. The first step is to move one bamboo from slot 23 into the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 3, "index": 23}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 62, "index": 36}, {"type": "carved_pumpkin", "quantity": 21, "index": 38}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 44, "index": 42}]
thought: I now need to move another bamboo from slot 23 into the crafting grid at slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 2, "index": 23}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 62, "index": 36}, {"type": "carved_pumpkin", "quantity": 21, "index": 38}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 44, "index": 42}]
thought: I have now crafted the first stick and need to move it to a free slot in my inventory. Slot 12 is currently empty, so I will move the stick there.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 2, "index": 23}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 62, "index": 36}, {"type": "carved_pumpkin", "quantity": 21, "index": 38}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 44, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft an iron_pickaxe I need 2 sticks and 3 iron_ingots. I currently have 1 stick and 9 iron_ingots. Therefore, I need to craft 1 more stick. The simplest way to do this is to place bamboo in the crafting table. I will move one of the bamboos from slot 23 to slot 1 in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe

thought: I need to place another bamboo in the crafting table. I will move one of the bamboos from slot 23 to slot 4 in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "wooden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "name_tag", "quantity": 62, "index": 36}, {"type": "carved_pumpkin", "quantity": 21, "index": 38}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 44, "index": 42}]

thought: I now have 2 sticks and 9 iron_ingots. I can craft the iron_pickaxe by placing the sticks and iron_ingots in the crafting table. I will move the stick from slot 0 to slot 13 in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe

thought: To craft an iron_pickaxe, I need to place 3 iron ingots on top of each other, and a stick below the middle one. Since I already have all the required ingredients, I will start by moving the first iron ingot to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
